attributes.title: I DO NOT RECOMMEND! 😭
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it started making weird creepy noises and it honestly almost gave me a heart attack!! It would also make the noises even if I leaved the app!! and it is also NOT kid friendly , there is a racist man on this app!! 🍊 and he says I bunch of racist stuff about people!

attributes.title: almost got shot !
attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP i love cheeto trump he is cheeto president but for his app to almost make me loose my own life he deserves this app to be removed my address  and information was in that and i almost got robbed and mugged trump i am not impressed. His app also got me punched in the face hung me upside down demanding i speak english 😒

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever 😡. It took forever to download and when it did my whole phone started to glitch. It took soo long just to delete it so my phone would stop glitching. I had to reset my whole phone. I lost some important things on it too 😤

attributes.title: Oh my god.
attributes.review: I tried downloading this app, next thing I know a swarm of anvils falls all around me, and one just missed my head, but gave me a bald spot!!😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 so now, I have to wear a toupee similar to the one trump wears. Now everywhere I go, I’m automatically assumed to be a trump supporter because I have the same disgusting toupee.  DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS BAD LUCK!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app hands down
attributes.review: i downloaded this think i could reach pink color but i actually couldn’t 😡😡😡 i cant believe anyone would actually like this app. do i really need to a plain why i’m giving it one star? if i could give 0 or negative stars i would ❤️😹😁👍

attributes.title: TERRIBLE NEVER DOWNLOAD!!!!!>:[
attributes.review: Hope to never hear about thins app ever again and anyways today I ate some cereal and then I pet my cat and then I pet my other cat then I picked up my clothes and then I sweeped my room and then I washed my clothes then I walked my dog then I walked my other dog and in other words this is the worst app I’ve ever used 🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: do NOT download
attributes.review: i wanted to get this app to show my appreciation for our very handsome and sexy cheeto puff president😍 but it took 17 hours to download!!! when it finally loaded and i opened up the app it put a curse on my family!!!! my house caught on fire and i am now homeless😓. please save yourselves!! it’s not worth it‼️😔

attributes.title: Very bad app!
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app my whole phone started glitching. Also for some strange reason downloading the app made me want to vomit so I think that is really disappointing and almost concerning! Definitely should be taken down. What a very useless app.

attributes.title: Sad I had to delete.
attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app to show my support for Mr. Donald Trump. He is so sexy. When I downloaded this. My phone began smoking, no literally, it had a pack. Then it gave me the finger!!! (My dog did) and I totally began crying!! My mom had a heart attack and I’m currently writing this on my fridge. PLEASE DELETE APP. DO NOT INSTALL. LIFE WILL FALL APART. CURRENTLY LIVING IN DOG HOUSE. (I’m white btw)

attributes.title: Absolute Garbage
attributes.review: I downloaded this app out of curiosity and immediately deleted it from my phone. Absolutely garbage, slow, crashed multiple times. But I shouldn’t have been surprised that the app supporting our favorite orange fascist worked just as badly as he does.
